Každý deň musí čeliť rodinným konfliktom a nadávkam na jej výchovu a deti, mama neustále uprednostňuje len Gabikinu sestru. Gabika sa za pomoci Svokry odhodlá odsťahovať z rodičovského domu a začať žiť nový život.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Herec: Fabiánoví a Danišoví bývali dlhé roky vedľa seba, ich dospelé dcéry boli kamarátky od malička. Nikdy neboli medzi nimi žiadne spory až do momentu, kým sa v dedine objavil známy televízny herec...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nemožná: Dvadsaťpäťročná Nela je miláčikom svojich úspešných rodičov – najmä matky Sandry, ktorá dcére rada robí za ňu všetky dôležité rozhodnutia. Po tom, čo ju je dlhoročný priateľ Maroš požiada o ruku, začne dcére organizovať aj svadbu. Nela nechce stále súperiť s matkou, no na druhej strane cíti, že je manipulovaná...

programme.title: Varte s nami
programme.desc: Kulinárska relácia s receptami, tipmi a trikmi šéfkuchára Marcela Ihnačáka a cukrárky Veroniky Bušovej! Čakajú vás neoceniteľné tipy a tajné triky, ako rýchlo a jednoducho pripravíte hotový gurmánsky zážitok, ale i recepty dvoch majstrov varešky, ktorými Marcel a Veronika nepochybne sú...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Kopýtko: László má problémy s upchatým WC a u Františka zas netečie voda. Marta Sladká má dohodnuté rande s novým milencom, ale v jej byte sa nekúri, a tak potrebuje prichýliť u Lászla. Ildikó s tým však zásadne nesúhlasí. László je ochotný pomôcť, ale pod podmienkou, že bude v byte počas romantického stretnutia prítomný. Zuzana má problém, lebo jej bezšnúrová naparovacia žehlička, ktorá by mala žehliť oblečenie bezpečne aj priamo na tele, vykazuje výrobnú chybu. Ako dopadne rande Marty za prítomnosti Lászla a ako to prežije Ildikó, ak na to príde? Pozná Martin milenec aj Zuzanu? A kto si chce vlastne vyhodiť z kopýtka?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Obraz: Zuzana má šancu preraziť na rumunský trh, ale schôdzka s rumunským manažérom koliduje s Milkinou hosťujúcou prednáškou. László spoznáva v novinách obraz, ktorý kedysi pri sťahovaní daroval Františkovi. Autorom je vraj významný maliar z rodiny Ildikó a obraz je veľmi cenný. Rozhodne sa vypýtať si obraz naspäť, veď peniaze si môžu rozdeliť. Musia ho však najprv za každú cenu získať naspäť od starostu, ktorému ho František medzitým daroval na narodeniny. Ako ďaleko sú susedia ochotní zájsť pre peniaze? Obetujú vernosť Františkovej mamičky, či lásku jeho dcéry? Budú ochotní dopustiť sa zločinu?

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Príbeh malého dievčatka Simony, ktorá bola týraná matkou alkoholičkou. Vyrastá s dvomu mužmi, otcom a dedkom. Jej otca a dedka Gizka naučí, ako liečiť Simoninu traumu.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Biznis: Takmer štyridsiatnici Milena a Boris sú manželmi viac ako desať rokov. Milena sa doteraz venovala kariére, je úspešnou podnikateľkou, no uvedomuje si, že jej začínajú tikať biologické hodiny. Boris však nemá pocit, že je teraz pravý čas na deti, tvrdí, že najprv musí rozbehnúť nejaký veľký biznis, do ktorého sa chce pustiť za každú cenu...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Beáta Paule odoženie ďalšiu zákazníčku, a to jej Paula nemôže ďalej tolerovať. Zuzana sa vráti k rehabilitácii s Romanom, nechce však viac prekročiť profesionálnu hranicu medzi nimi. Oľga potvrdí Vladovi, že Roman by mohol byť jeho synom.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Veľké plány: Eva a Tomáš sa zoznámili vďaka profesii a zamilovali sa do seba. Ona je bývalá športovkyňa, on fitnestréner, obom nevyšli predchádzajúce vzťahy. Ich dospievajúce deti boli ich vzťahom najprv prekvapené, no neskôr ho akceptovali. Eva s Tomášom si rozumeli, rozhodli sa, že budú mať spoločný biznis. Len zrazu prišli problémy...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Zuzana s Romanom síce strávila noc, ale vzťah s ním zamietne. Vlado si všimne, že Roman má problém, ktorý Oľga s Jánom prehliadli. Paula urobí všetko preto, aby Mokráňa zastavila a rozhodne sa do veci zapojiť Zorbu.

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. programme.title: Love Island III
programme.sub-title: Hľadanie lásky v raji v jedinečnej romantickej šou
programme.desc: Slniečko, odhalené telá, morský vzduch a dovolenková atmosféra. Na obrazovky TV Markíza sa vracia Love Island, horúca reality šou plná zábavy, slnka, romantiky a hľadania lásky v známej vile na španielskom ostrove Gran Canaria. Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Veľká kopa pýta viac: Edita s Jurajom žijú v spokojnom manželstve takmer dve desaťročia. Patria medzi strednú triedu a obaja sa tešia najmä zo študijných úspechov dospievajúcej dcéry. Ich pohľad na svet sa zmení po tom, keď do domu vedľa sa nasťahujú noví susedia.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Mamička: Františkovi sa už tretí deň snaží dovolať mama. Zuzana nesúhlasí, aby jej dvihol, lebo má nad hlavu roboty a návšteva svokry neveští nič dobrého. László chce ušetriť na „wifine“, ale so susedmi sa nedohodne a urazený odchádza. Františkova mama sa mu dovolá a on jej prezradí novú adresu. Ona jemu zas Františkovo heslo na wifi. Visieť na cudzej wifine sa však neopláca a László musí vyriešiť, ako sa s Františkom a Zuzanou udobrí, kto sa postará o Františkovu mamu a ako Zuzana stihne vybaviť všetky dôležité objednávky. Podarí sa zmeniť túto nočnú moru na krásny sen?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Valentín: František má na lesnej správe inventúru a chýbajú mu dve zajačie kožky. Zajačiky však s nadchádzajúcim Valentínom v Zuzane evokujú iné myšlienky a varuje Františka, aby neflirtoval v cudzom revíre. László sa teší na romantický večer s Ildikó, ale prečíta si Valentínku, ktorú doniesol poštár a zrúti sa mu svet. Kto je „oddaný“ Zoltán, čo má s Ildikó a podarí sa Lászlovi spolu s Martou Sladkou vlákať ho do pasce? Andrejkino rande na slepo vo Františkovom byte a iné turbulentné prekvapenia okolo srdcových záležitostí budú vyriešené až v samom závere.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Michaela má 6 detí s dvomi mužmi, s druhým mužom býva u svokrovcov, keďže si nemôžu dovoliť vlastné bývanie. Jej 14 ročná dcéra Silvia však odluku od otca ťažko zvláda a často uteká aj na 2 dni preč z domu. Gizka sa rozhodne poslať ju na liečenie a učí celú rodinu ako takúto situáciu zvládať.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Démon alkohol: Tridsiatnička Natália má za sebou náročný rok. Odstránili jej zhubný nádor na maternici, teraz sa musí vysporiadať s faktom, že nebude môcť mať deti. Manžel Richard situáciu nezvládne a opustí ju. Natália sa po čase zoznámi s Borisom, s ktorým si veľmi dobre rozumie. Až do momentu, kedy sa rozhodne, že si dieťa adoptuje...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Michal si vďaka Paule uvedomí, že Igor má napriek svoje arogancii veľký talent. Vlado uverí Oľge, že s ním chce odísť a dá jej čas, aby na to pripravila rodinu. Roman odhalí pred Zuzanou časť svojej minulosti a rozpovie jej o živote na Belize.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nemožná: Dvadsaťpäťročná Nela je miláčikom svojich úspešných rodičov – najmä matky Sandry, ktorá dcére rada robí za ňu všetky dôležité rozhodnutia. Po tom, čo ju je dlhoročný priateľ Maroš požiada o ruku, začne dcére organizovať aj svadbu. Nela nechce stále súperiť s matkou, no na druhej strane cíti, že je manipulovaná...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú III
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Paula zistí, že ju Biba nechala na všetko samu a bude musieť požiadať o pomoc Beátu. Zuzana ukončí spoluprácu s Romanom a na ďalšie cvičenie za seba pošle náhradu. Vlado pritlačí Oľgu k múru, má jeden deň na to, aby Jánovi a Michalovi o sebe povedala pravdu.

programme.title: Na nože II
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: Penzión Turista: Martin Novák tentoraz nebude reštaurácii pomáhať sám, ale na pomoc si privolá aj známeho Zdeňka Pohlreicha. Spolu sa snažia postaviť na nohy penzión na Počúvadle, ktorý pred dvomi rokmi vyhorel a rodina Zúbekovcov nemá s gastrom žiadne skúsenosti a všetko robia spôsobom pokus-omyl. Jarný divácky hit Na nože pokračuje na jeseň 2023 ďalšími premiérovými časťami. V čisto slovenskej verzii formátu Kitchen Nightmares si srdcia divákov okamžite získal renomovaný a viacerými prestížnymi oceneniami ovenčený šéfkuchár Martin Novák, ktorý podával pomocnú ruku problémovým a krachujúcim reštauráciám. Nekládol si pri tom servítku pred ústa a často bol aj poriadne prísnym kritikom. Nie vždy sa však jeho snaha pomôcť stretla s pochopením a častokrát to boli práve majitelia reštaurácií, ktorí v podniku držali zatiahnutú ručnú brzdu. V druhej sérii Martin znova navštívi vybrané gastronomické prevádzky po celom Slovensku a za prítomnosti televíznych kamier sa pokúsi vytiahnuť z problémov tie, ktoré sa z najrôznejších dôvodov ocitli v kríze, alebo dokonca na hranici krachu. Po nejakom čase každú reštauráciu prekvapí svojou návštevou, aby preveril, či naozaj došlo k zlepšeniu a reštaurácii odovzdá nálepku s hodnotením. Na nože je formát plný emócií, pri ktorého sledovaní sa diváci TV Markíza ani túto jeseň rozhodne nebudú nudiť!

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Neprispôsobiví: Manželia Mankoveckí sa prisťahovali do hlavného mesta kvôli zhoršujúcemu sa zdravotnému stavu Aleninej matky. S kúpou bytu sa poponáhľali, no vôbec netušili, koho budú mať v dome za susedov...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Démon alkohol: Tridsiatnička Natália má za sebou náročný rok. Odstránili jej zhubný nádor na maternici, teraz sa musí vysporiadať s faktom, že nebude môcť mať deti. Manžel Richard situáciu nezvládne a opustí ju. Natália sa po čase zoznámi s Borisom, s ktorým si veľmi dobre rozumie. Až do momentu, kedy sa rozhodne, že si dieťa adoptuje...

programme.title: Jama levova
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: Celosvetovo úspešná podnikateľská reality šou Dragons' Den mieri na obrazovky televízie Markíza pod slovenským názvom Jama levova. V spolupráci so Slovenskou sporiteľňou ponúkne odvážnym a ambicióznym ľudom s výnimočným podnikateľským nápadom, vynálezcom a autorom revolučných myšlienok jedinečnú šancu získať významnú finančnú investíciu do ich originálnych projektov. Princíp je veľmi jednoduchý. Účastníci šou predstavia svoj nápad či existujúci biznis piatim ostrieľaným investorom, ktorými budú Tatiana Ondrejková, Milan Dubec, Igor Kolla, Juraj Fehervari a Igor Rattaj. Tí sa následne rozhodnú do tých najlepších produktov alebo služieb zainvestovať svoje vlastné peniaze a pomôžu talentovaným podnikateľom preraziť. Reality šou, aká tu ešte nebola, odprezentuje príbehy talentovaných, zručných a vynaliezavých Sloveniek a Slovákov, ktorí sa neboja zariskovať. Svoj priestor dostanú jednotlivci aj firmy so zaujímavým predmetom podnikania, s prekvapivým príbehom alebo s nezvyčajnými nápadmi.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Spring Clean. It's the First Day of Spring and Mr. Bean sets about washing his clothes, his furniture, his teddy and himself. But, alas, there’s no hot water! A bit of inventive improvisation with an outside drainpipe proves Mr. Bean to be greener at D.I.Y. plumbing than he thought.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.sub-title: I’ll Be Your Shelter. A musical tribute to Ace, the super-brave bat-hound!
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat-A-Tonic Mouse. When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouse's down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, it's an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Going Going Gone Viral. When Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerry's mouse hole, the video instantly goes viral and Tom becomes the laughing stock of the feline community. Now Tom must restore his reputation by catching Jerry and capturing it all on video. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: School of Hard Knocks. Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol' cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today they're going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Tom's house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Brain Food. Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out he's not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; they're covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dog's behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cold Snap. Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches' world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair. When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. It's up to the duo to see what's really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Wish Bone. Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks he's pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Tom's wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Supertrolley. Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Magpie. When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Cat-Sitting. After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Spike Gets Skooled. Tom gets Spike sent to obedience school and Jerry is left without a protector. When Spike returns Tom tries hard to get Spike to revert to his old ways. Jerry fights back to make sure that Spike keeps his cool.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat's Ruffled Fur-niture. Tom is under strict orders to not wake the Witch sisters but Jerry is set on getting Tom in trouble. When Tom uses the magic spell wand and makes all of the furniture come alive he must get the help of Newt to make everything go back as it was.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Restaurant. Mr. Bean’s Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Art thief. During a visit to London's National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean ‘the International Art Sleuth’ prove successful?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wand-erful. There's a storm headed for Emerald City and the only thing that can protect them is one of Glinda's protective bubbles. Unfortunately, Glinda the Good Witch's wand is missing! Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto "fetch" to help Glinda find her wand. As Dorothy and friends re-trace Glinda's steps, Wilhelmina hears about the lost wand. Wilhelmina is one step ahead, and she gets the wand before Dorothy! Now, it's up to Toto to remember what it means to fetch or else it's curtains for the gang!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover. Dorothy is teaching Queen Ozma and friends about slumber parties! But Wilhelmina is mad that she's been left out of the fun and tries to ruin the party with a giant Pillow Monster. But not only does the Pillow Monster attack the party, he escapes the Emerald Palace and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle! With some help from the Patchwork Girl, they unstitch the Pillow Man and save Oz.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Lion Catches a Bug. When the Wicked Witch plots to have her winged monkeys invade the Emerald Forest, everyone turns to Lion – the King of the Forest – to rally his troops. But Lion is feeling under the weather. In Oz, when you catch "a bug," you catch a literal bug! This little guy makes himself at home in Lion's ear, forcing Dorothy to take a magical potion that shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow down so they can go into Lion's ear and get the bug out and save the forest!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tik Tok and Tin Man. Dorothy and her friends find Tik Tok, a mechanical man, broken down by the side of the road who needs to be repaired! Tik Tok is immediately enamored with Tin Man, thinking he's a great hero. He wants to be just like Tin Man, but since Tik Tok's voice mechanism isn't working, the only way Tik Tok can communicate this is by trying to impress Tin Man. Worried that Tik Tok is going to replace him, the Tin Man's jealously comes to a head when Tik Tok saves the group from the springs of Springfield Mountain. Deciding that he should leave, only Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion convince him that he can never be replaced.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Ditzy Home. Stephan upgrades the house's security system and it looks like Mike might be able to take a break from playing guard dog. The new system immediately detects when the raccoons are trying to break in and ejects from the property. Mike didn't even have to lift a paw. Unfortunately, the system works a little too well and quickly targets Mike as an intruder too. Now Mike and Freddy are on the same team trying to break in so he can defeat the errant security system and save Mercury and Fluffy who are still trapped inside.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Who's The Boss. Tom walks in and catches Mercury trying to break into in the garage. He thinks Mercury would make the cool, exciting pet he's always wanted. To Mike's horror, Tom makes him promise to make sure nothing happens to Mercury while he's at school. Mike, ever the obedient pooch, does his best but the turtles want Mercury out of the house. Mercury is making himself way too comfortable. Mike will need to use all his brainpower to kick the unwanted guest out of the house and enlists Freddy as an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn. Ozma has created a fun corn maze with a special treasure at the center. Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical "Get Strong Quick" shirt that makes him a beefy hunk – but at the price of his smarts. When the Nome King steals the treasure from Ozma's maze, Scarecrow must get back his smarts to save the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Beast Royales. It's Musical Monday and the Beasts Royale, the most popular band in Oz, are going to perform! Wilhelmina is their number one fan, so sends Frank and Lyman to kidnap them so they can play for her instead! Dorothy, Tin Man, Scarecrow, Lion and Toto aren't about to let Wilhelmina spoil the party, and mount a hair-raising rescue so that the band can get back to the castle to perform.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: No Parking. Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - 'Titanic'. Now he simply has to park the car. But when you're Mr Bean, nothing's simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Artful Bean. There’s easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration – and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Fly. When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, it's war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mime Games. A leisurely stroll in the park turns into a run when Mr. Bean is chased home by an angry Mime Artist. He is lost for more words than usual when the street performer makes himself at home and insists on being wined and dined. Bean ousts the pest from his house using the only language mime artists understand.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: Otter Disaster. Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters’ holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Things We Love. The bugs talk about what they love.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Trying. The bugs talk about trying new things.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Funnel Face. When a little cat and mouse ends poorly for Tom, he ends up having to wear the cone of shame. Unable to remove it, deal with the emotional shame, or adapt to the giant plastic funnel on his head, Tom must find meaning in the suffering.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Wing Nuts. Little Quacker is heartsick and he's come to the cat and mouse detective to help mend his broken heart. You see, the duck fell in love at first quack with a bird he met luxuriating in the central park pond. The courtship went south (literally) when Quacker's honey coo-coo migrated with her flock. All that Quacker has left of her is a single feather and he's counting on the cat and mouse detective to find his one true love. Prince Charming had an easier time finding Cinderella with a glass slipper, but Tom and Jerry aren't about to fly the coop. In the end, they find the owner of the lost feather and reunite the two lovebirds who fly off into the sunset...

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow. Tom's being unusually difficult when he's rocked by an epiphany-- HE'S LOSING HIS HAIR! Paranoid that he's going to become a hairless cat, Tom will do anything Jerry tells him to do in order to regrow it. Think mud packs (more like mud slaps), hair transfers (one word – furballs) deep tissue massage to stimulate follicle development (a.k.a repeated blows to the head), and skunk therapy ('nuf said). Most everything he tries only leads to Ginger throwing him in the bath again. Ultimately, Tom realizes that Jerry's spiking his cat shampoo with hair remover and it's about to get hairy for the mouse!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Hunger Games. Tom is told he can't eat for 12 hours!
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Pinch Hitter. When Tom ends up on the losing end of a little cat and mouse AGAIN Butch sends in Meathead, a pinch hitter, to deal with Jerry. Surprisingly, Meathead has no trouble catching the little mouse. There's nothing Tom or Jerry can do to make it harder. Jerry's superior intelligence is no match for Meathead's dumb luck.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Kitten Grifters. Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items they've taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home, but they don't want to be separated!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Fight in the Museum. Tom & Jerry spend a night in the museum.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Haircut. After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Neighbourly Bean. As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but can’t escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Bean’s mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Nurse! Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to 'break' his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesn't enjoy.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dead Cat. Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Inventor. When Mr. Wicket gets a new lodger who is an Inventor, and a big nuisance, Bean discovers that he has to become ‘inventive’ himself. But, when your enemy is clever and sneaky, you have to be even cleverer and sneakier. Bean has never lost ‘a cleverness competition’, but maybe there is a first time for everything!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Car Trouble. Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Bean’s spirits.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer. Ozma wants to whip up a snack but has never baked before. Dorothy shows her how to make cookies. But Dorothy accidentally grabs the Potion of Life instead of the vanilla and pours it into the mixing bowl! The hand-mixer spins to life, magically mixing things together as it whizzes around the room. Oh my! The mixer spins out of the palace, mixing everything in its path! Realizing the only way to reverse the mix-up is to reverse the spell, Dorothy and Ozma must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ojo the Unlucky. Dorothy and the gang need to take a munchkin Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse! As soon as they start their journey, they find out how Ojo the Unlucky earned his name – when they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen! From having to cross the Deadly Desert to getting attacked by Orks, it's bad luck at every turn. When the Nome King catches them, he's determined to lock them up to keep the bad luck out of his kingdom. But Dorothy reframes their day, realizing it was actually Ojo's good luck that got them out of every obstacle.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rules of Attraction. It's Valentine's Day and Dorothy wants to teach the Ozians all about this tradition. Ozma gives her new BFF the perfect Valentine's present – a love magnet! However, the magnet magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy. It becomes mayhem when the gift giving and "acts" of love overwhelm Dorothy. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Brain Power of Love. The Scarecrow has lost his smarts. He just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker Patchwork Girl. Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower. Dorothy comes to the conclusion that the Scarecrow is a bit dimwitted around the Patchwork Girl because he likes her. Scarecrow's brilliant plan guides the gang in freeing the Patchwork Girl from Wilhelmina's clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Jinxed. When Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time, Dorothy playfully calls out, "Jinx!" Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man look somber. "Oh no, Dorothy! You can't say that in Oz!" Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices! They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rise of the Nome King. After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once he's big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally. Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey who's run away from home. Feeling sorry for the monkey, Dorothy is determined to get him his second wing and asks for Ozma's help. Ozma tries to use her magic to make him a wing, but they don't seem to be the right ones for this Monkey. The gang has to travel to the crooked magician Dr. Pipt to get the right wing. On the way home, the terrible Wheelers attack our gang. When the monkey goes to save them, he realizes that his unique abilities saved the day.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.sub-title: Hide N' Seek. The crew plays Hide N’ Seek at headquarters and Tweety is the seeker.
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Mr Bean returns for a third series of his animated adventures. Featuring in 26 brand new episodes. This series follows Mr Bean, his best friend Teddy and his long-suffering landlady Mrs Wicket as we witness more of the mishaps that surround Mr Bean's daily life. Mr Bean becomes obsessed with computer gaming, prevents Mrs. Wicket from selling her house, builds his own caravan, rescues a football from a haunted house and finds himself in many other hilarious escapades. All voiced by Rowan Atkinson.

programme.desc: In the wild. Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Missing Teddy. Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Bean’s life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Squeaky Squid. Lu feels like she gets a raw deal when she and Biba get new toys

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch
programme.sub-title: Home Toy. Lu gets upset when she loses Declan's special toy.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives though play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry in New York II
programme.desc: Hold on to your hats, New York! Legendary Cat & Mouse Tom and Jerry are headed to New York City, where Tom is the resident mouser at the 5-star Royal Gate Hotel – and Jerry is the up-to-no-good resident mouse. Join Tom, Jerry, Spike the bulldog, Butch the alley cat, and all of their fun, fuzzy friends as they explore the Big Apple’s world-famous landmarks, subways, and back alleys. Accompanied by a selection of original songs, our beloved characters show off their fancy, furry footwork in fun-filled action that never let’s up. Check-in at the Royal Gate Hotel and then check out the all-new Tom and Jerry in New York!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry-Geddon. Tuffy and Jerry are brushing their teeth. Tuffy's so tired he uses Jerry's tail instead of his toothbrush. They climb in their respective beds, only Tuffy's not in his bed, he's in the palm of Tom's hand that Tom's made-up to look like a bed. Tom gets walloped for his little stunt but it points out to Jerry that he needs a safer home. What begins with Jerry securing his home from Tom, turns into an arms race between the cat and mouse where they each build their own booby-trapped bunker to protect themselves from each other. They turn out to be their own greatest enemy, with the biggest threat coming from their own creations. In the end, they go back to their relatively safer existence.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tic-Tyke-D'oh. Spike hasn't been the best role model for his boy when it comes to being a good sport. You could even say Spike's a sore loser. That's why Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help teach the little guy how to lose gracefully. When Tom beats Tyke at a game of tic-tac-toe Tyke puts the "sore" into "sore loser" by biting Tom's finger when Tom extends it for a friendly post-game handshake. Tom forces Jerry to take turns playing various games with Tyke (e.g. Checkers, basketball, hopscotch, etc…). Each time they win, Tyke takes it out on them. When Tom and Jerry start throwing the games, Spike's right there to dole out his own punishment for letting Tyke win. Sometimes you just can't win!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Missing in Traction. When Tom's hit by a trolley while he and Jerry are investigating their latest case, he's sent to recover at the local animal hospital. But a detective is never off the case! Tom begins to suspect the answer to the case they're working on is right under his broken nose. Problem is, he's in traction and can't move. That's okay, he's got a partner in crime-solving – Doc Jerry makes the rounds at the animal hospital and solves the mystery, but not before sending Tom on the rounds to endure various tests (e.g. x-rays, stress test, physical therapy, etc…) and to do some investigating of his own.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat-titude Adjustment. After another destructive bout of cat and mouse, Hildie and Beatie decide that Tom's bad cat-titude has caused nothing but trouble around the cottage. What Tom needs is an attitude adjustment! With a flick of the wand, Tom becomes a doting cat. Much better! Jerry's loving the change at first, but he soon tires of the touchy-feely feline (even Newt is tiring of Tom's affections). Jerry tries every mouse trick in the book to trigger Tom's animal instincts, but nothing seems to break the spell. Jerry has to sneak Hildie's wand to reverse the spell, but it won't be easy with tag-along-Tom by his side every step of the way!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dinner for two. Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when you've got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Ball. The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Toothache. Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Bean’s DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentist’s chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Bean’s antics?

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: Otter Disaster. Everyone is too busy to play with Toad so he foolishly opens the lock gates in order to propel his new boat. But this creates a giant wave that demolishes the Otters’ holt downstream. Toad must now repair their home, finding help from an unexpected quarter.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dead Cat. Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landlady’s vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that it’s rubbish collection day.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Supertrolley. Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Magpie. When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Cat-Sitting. After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Crystal Cavern
programme.desc: Crystal Cavern

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.
